results.title: Metformin ameliorates valve interstitial cell calcification by promoting autophagic flux
results.text_hl: In the present study we investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alleviates @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Valve_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006349 @@@valvular calcification@@@ through the autophagy-mediated recycling of @GENE_RUNX2 @GENE_367218 @@@Runx2@@@.
